body: Yes, I know (and think there is an issue about that somewhere). The problem is that the current doc build is not yet fully warning-free (also not after this PR), of which some I don't directly know how to fix. So as long that is not the case, we cannot let it fail on that.

We could let sphinx fail on a a warning/error, or otherwise parse the log and if certain words are present (like 'ERROR') then let travis fail (and in this way, be a bit more flexible on what is not allowed to fail).
